name: Sensor_Saturation_Blast
description: Sustained 5-second full-power IR saturates CMOS sensor photodiodes completely
expected_result: Entire sensor array saturates, producing pure white video. Effect lasts as long as IR is active. Immediate recovery when stopped.
limitations: Requires line-of-sight. Dome cameras with IR coating need closer range (2-3m). Ineffective on thermal cameras.
